vlive.korean: [머리 흔들다가 풍력발전소에 풍차로 취직했잖아요] 응원봉... [I did a windmill and I got a job at a wind power plant... as a windmill...] Light stick. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [UP10TION] 영원히 철 안 들 샤랑둥이를 영원히 샤랑해💛 (XIAO talking about his hair style)
vlive.english: [I did a windmill and I got a job at a wind power plant... as a windmill...] Light stick.

vlive.korean: 원자력 발전소. A nuclear power plant. 듣기 View video IMFACT : [IMFACT] 릴레이 요리(feat. 임팩트는요리사)
어떤? - 아니 원자력 발전소가... What kind of job? - You know the nuclear power plant... 듣기 View video IMFACT : [IMFACT] 릴레이 요리(feat. 임팩트는요리사)
vlive.english: What kind of job? - You know the nuclear power plant...

vlive.korean: 그게 원자력 발전소 나온사람도 잘 못보내는 거에요. It is still very hard for expert to do it. 듣기 View video IMFACT : [IMFACT] 릴레이 요리(feat. 임팩트는요리사)
vlive.english: It is still very hard for expert to do it.

vlive.korean: 풍력발전소에 보면 진짜 아름다워요 거기 한번 놀러 가보세요. The wind power plants are really beautiful. Go visit them. 듣기 View video RYU JUNYEOL : [FULL]류준열의 렛츠고 라이브(Ryu Jun Yeol's Let’s Go Live)
vlive.english: The wind power plants are really beautiful. Go visit them.
